subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Memphis Grizzlies signed the free agent Leon Powe, giving the Grizzlies help at forward where Rudy Gay remains out after dislocating his left shoulder.
snippet: The Memphis Grizzlies signed the free agent Leon Powe, giving the Grizzlies help at forward where Rudy Gay remains out after dislocating his left shoulder.
